sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog v-model="show" persistent max-width="400">
    <v-card>
      <v-card-title class="headline text-xs-center" >{{message}}</v-card-title>
      <v-card-actions class="d-flex justify-center">
          <v-btn color="error"  text @click="cancel()">Cancel</v-btn>
          <v-btn color="green darken-1" text @click="agree()">Agree</v-btn>
      </v-card-actions>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import { mapActions } from 'vuex';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      show: false,
      message: '',
    };
  },
  created() {
    this.$store.watch(
      state => state.showDialog.show,
      () => {
        const msg = this.$store.state.showDialog.message;
        if (msg !== '') {
          this.show = true;
          this.message = this.$store.state.showDialog.message;
        } else {
          this.show = false;
          this.message = '';
        }
      },
    );
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions('song', {
      removeSong: 'removeSong',
    }),
    ...mapActions('singer', {
      removeSinger: 'removeSinger',
    }),
    cancel() {
      this.$store.commit('closeDialog');
    },
    agree() {
      if (window.location.pathname === '/singer') {
        const loader = this.$loading.show();
        this.removeSinger({ id: this.$store.state.showDialog.data.id })
          .then(() => {
            this.$store.commit('setSnack', {
              snack: 'Data has been deleted successfully!',
              color: 'warning',
            });
            loader.hide(); // goi lai getAllList
            this.cancel();
          })
          .catch((error) => {
            this.$store.commit('setSnack', {
              snack: `Something went wrong, please try again later${error.message}`,
              color: 'error',
            });
            loader.hide();
          });
      } else {
        const loader = this.$loading.show();
        this.removeSong({ id: this.$store.state.showDialog.data.id })
          .then(() => {
            this.$store.commit('setSnack', {
              snack: 'Data has been deleted successfully!',
              color: 'warning',
            });
            loader.hide();
            this.cancel();
          })
          .catch((error) => {
            this.$store.commit('setSnack', {
              snack: `Something went wrong, please try again later${error.message}`,
              color: 'error',
            });
            loader.hide();
          });
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
